revised_title: Deep-Sea Coral and Crustacean Observations During the 'Challenger' Expedition
tldr: The author, Dr. Rudolf von Willemoes-Suhm, provides a preliminary report on observations made during the 'Challenger' expedition, focusing on deep-sea coral and crustacean biology. The report discusses the distribution and characteristics of various deep-sea coral species and the discovery of new and unique deep-sea crustaceans. The author also touches upon other marine life, such as worms, mollusks, and fish, encountered during the expedition.
